name: The Blind Jaskier
description:
Welcome to The Blind Jaskier, a speakeasy in Prohibition era New York, located in the basement of a soda shop, Jaskier's Soda Fountain.

Make decisions on who to let in, how to restock your supply, maintain a steady patron base, and keep your operation financially afloat. Taking a risk with new faces could lead to a loyal patron for years or a tip off to the police causing a raid.  Keep a close eye on your visitors as you grow your business!

This game was created by Enya Oreshkin, Igor Oreshkin, Hikari Oishi, and Cesar Polanco for Historically Accurate Game Jam 5.
